name: ConnectedInvestors
0:
”Alexa ask Connected Investors find me a property to flip in Wilmington NC”
”Alexa ask Connected Investors read a blog”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: connected investors
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Say: Hey Alexa Open Connected Investors and find me a flip in (Your City) (Your state) 

For example: "Hey Alexa Open Connected Investors and find me a flip in Wilmington North Carolina" 

Are you a real estate investor or someone looking to find properties at deep-discounts? Use this free real estate investing skill to understand how many real estate investment opportunities are available in your city! 

This skill provides you with the count and one example. This is the first of many skills ConnectedInvestors.com is rolling out. 

To access more property details visit Connectedinvestors.com and sign up for free to become a member. You can also search Connected Investors in your app store and download the free real estate investing app. This app allows you to connect with motivated sellers, cash buyers, other real estate investors and more. 

FAQ: 

Q) What do I say to Alexa? 
A) First think of a city and state you want to search. For example if you live in Atlanta Georgia you would say...

"Hey Alexa open Connected Investors and find me a flip in Atlanta Georgia." 

Q)Where is Connected Investors Pulling Their Data From? 
A)Connected investors aggregates and analyzes billions of data points on every property across the USA to locate the types of properties every real estate investor needs to be successful .

Q) What Property Types Does Alexa Find? 
A) Just to name a few... 
- Vacant
- Probate
- Pre-Foreclosures
- Foreclosures / REO
- Court house auctions
- Online auctions
- Motivated FSBO
- Wholesale properties. 
- Any property with equity that has an owner with selling pressure. 

Q) How can I unlock more data than is available though Alexa? 
A) Text the word demo to (910) 778-7600 

Enjoy this new Alexa Skill brought to you by ConnectedInvestors.com - The real estate investors marketplace and community. 

Putting the ROI in REI,
